scripts.build: npm run build:contract && npm run build:web
scripts.build:web: export NODE_ENV=mainnet && rm -r mainnet && parcel build src/index.html --public-url ./ && mv dist mainnet
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run deploy:contract && npm run deploy:pages
scripts.prestart: npm run build:contract:debug && npm run dev:deploy:contract
scripts.start: export PORT=39106 && echo The app is starting! It will automatically open in your browser when ready && env-cmd -f ./neardev/dev-account.env parcel src/index.html --open
scripts.dev: export PORT=39106 && nodemon --watch contract/src -e rs --exec "npm run start"
scripts.test: npm run build:contract:debug && cd contract && cargo test -- --nocapture && cd .. && jest test --runInBand
scripts.build:web:testnet: export NODE_ENV=testnet && rm -rf testnet && parcel build src/index.html --public-url ./ && mv dist testnet
scripts.build:web:all: export NODE_ENV=mainnet && rm -r mainnet && parcel build src/index.html --public-url ./ && mv dist mainnet && export NODE_ENV=testnet && rm -r testnet && parcel build src/index.html --public-url ./ && mv dist testnet
